task.title: How to sign up for Tecent Meeting
task.shortdesc: You need a third account to start a tecent meeting or just register for your own

taskbody.context: first, entering your telephone number for a code second, entering the code for a account thirs, when you successfully applied for a account, you can sign up forth your can apply for a tecent meeting

step.cmd: In the end, you have your own account and and passwords, please keep it safe
